strings.Value: "Your Grace, today a {g|ValerieQ1}letter{/g} from {g|Brevoy}Brevoy{/g} was delivered to the castle. It was written by Fredero Sinnet, a paladin from the Order of the {g|Shelyn}Eternal Rose{/g}. It appears that Sir Sinnet is claiming right to one of your companions, who was brought up in his custody... Well, I'll leave it to you to handle this delicate matter."

"A {g|ValerieQ1}letter{/g} from {g|Brevoy}Brevoy{/g}, Your Grace. Fredero Sinnet, a paladin and mentor of the Order of the {g|Shelyn}Eternal Rose{/g}, has come to your lands to retrieve your companion, Valerie. It seems he's going on some sort of pilgrimage, and he hopes his former disciple will come with him. It's a rather unexpected request, but you'll have to deal with it. Here's the letter from Sinnet."

"I have an intriguing {g|ValerieQ1}letter{/g} for you, Your Grace. A certain Fredero Sinnet, a paladin of {g|Shelyn}Shelyn{/g} from {g|Brevoy}Brevoy{/g}, is claiming right to our charming Valerie! Not in the sense that the entire population of the capital is trying to, but as her teacher and mentor! Here's the letter â€“ see for yourself!"
